title: How to make money with beats I create - Quora

response.answer_text: I put the below video to help a friend that has a passion for music, but make little money as a teacher. Most of the things mentioned in this video can help you as well. There are a variety of ways you can make money selling beats. One coll thing you should consider is using YouTube where you can gain more exposure and potentially make more money. As I mentioned in the video, just record a session, talk about some of the stuff that goes into making beats, thought process, everything. Chop it up in 10-minute sessions and post it on YouTube. People that are interested in learning how to make beats can watch your videos and people that need beats may contact you directly
